## Introduction

```{r}
library(ape)
library(phytools)
treezip <- "http://files.opentreeoflife.org/synthesis/opentree9.1/opentree9.1_tree.tgz"
download.file(treezip,destfile="opentree9.1_tree.tgz")
untar("opentree9.1_tree.tgz")
print(getwd())
taxonomyplus.phy <- read.tree("opentree9.1_tree/labelled_supertree/labelled_supertree_ottnames.tre")
treeonly.phy <- read.tree("opentree9.1_tree/grafted_solution/grafted_solution_ottnames.tre")
save(taxonomyplus.phy, treeonly.phy, file="data/ott.rda")
```
